title: GitRefData
description: A git ref pointer (branch or tag) mirrored as a DWN record for subscription-based notifications.

name.description: Full ref name, e.g. refs/heads/main or refs/tags/v1.0.0

target.description: The commit SHA this ref points to

tagger.description: For annotated tags, the tagger identity

message.description: For annotated tags, the tag message
